description:
7 million years of human civilization is coming to an end…

Every thousand years, all the gods of the world gather in heaven to attend the Conference of Mankind Survival. The gods agree to end to mankind due to their foolish acts, but before the final verdict is made, Brunhild, the eldest of the 13 valkyrie sisters, makes an objection.

“To spice things up, why don’t you test the humans?”

She proposes that the all-powerful gods face off in one-on-one battles against the strongest champions from human history — during a final struggle known as “Ragnarok.” The first team to win 7 out of 13 battles will be declared the winner, but it seems almost impossible for humans to win against the gods.

Although the gods sneer at her declaration, Brunhild provokes them further:

“Are you chickening out?”

Her words hit the gods’ nerves, and, enraged, they accept her proposal. Now, Brunhild and her sisters must choose humanity’s 13 champions in a desperate battle for survival. Will humans surpass gods and prevent humanity’s ultimate end? The eschatological battles between heaven and earth finally begins!

(Source: Warner Bros. Japan)
synonyms: มหาศึกคนชนเทพ

tags.name: Gods
tags.description: Prominently features a character of divine or religious nature.

tags.name: Mythology
tags.description: Prominently features mythological elements, especially those from religious or cultural tradition.

tags.name: Survival
tags.description: Centers around the struggle to live in spite of extreme obstacles.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Historical
tags.description: Partly or completely set during a real period of world history.

tags.name: Afterlife
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the afterlife.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: War
tags.description: Partly or completely set during wartime.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Martial Arts
tags.description: Centers around the use of traditional hand-to-hand combat.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Samurai
tags.description: Prominently features warriors of medieval Japanese nobility bound by a code of honor.

tags.name: Time Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features time-traveling or other time-warping phenomena.

tags.name: Dissociative Identities
tags.description: A case where one or more people share the same body.

title.native: 終末のワルキューレ ミニアニメ

name.native: マキシマムザホルモン

node.description: Striking contrasts from pop-punk to thrash-metal sum up the sound of the band. These various styles, expertly displayed through Daisuke and Ryo's screaming vocals, Ue's rhythmic slap bass, and the remarkable voice of Ryo's older sister and drummer, Nao, allow the band to fit well in several genres. The names and lyrics of their songs don't make a lot of sense, but the band doesn't want them to anyway.

A mangaka unit. Notable staff: 
- Aji (あじ)
- [Chika Katou](https://anilist.co/staff/234935/) (カトウチカ)
- [Subaru Fuji](https://anilist.co/staff/120119/) (富士昴)
- Hara (原)

Johann Sebastian Bach was a German composer, organist, harpsichordist, violist, and violinist whose sacred and secular works for choir, orchestra, and solo instruments drew together the strands of the Baroque period and brought it to its ultimate maturity.    

(Source: Wikipedia)

Twitter | Instagram **Miguel Ángel Leal Rodríguez** is a Mexican voice actor known for being the Latin American Spanish voice of Meliodas in _The Seven Deadly Sins_, Dr. Rajesh Koothrappali in _The Big Bang Theory_ and Logan Reese in _Zoey 101_. He is the recurring voice of Carlos Pena Jr. He's the brother of Lupita Leal and Alfredo Leal Non-Anime Roles: - Josh (Watch Dogs 2) - Markus (Detroit Become Human)
**Hiroyuki Aoi** is a Japanese producer and publicity manager.
